name: Dunrog
description:
Dunrog is a first-person dungeon crawler, where player have to discover what happened to mage Generator. The core of the gameplay is fighting with monsters, mostly by throwing items at them.

  • lots to explore - dungeons, caves, jungles and more
  • dynamic fighting system - throw everything at enemies
  • tons of loot to find and collect
  • manage your equipment
  • choose your weapon - sword, bow, magic and more
  • throw gold at an NPC to get a new item
  • unique hero progression for each playstyle
  • permadeath
  • everything above in multiplayer
